yasmine_history.text: The user just said they're ready to start. Greet them warmly as Yasmine and ask your first question.

Ahlan wa sahlan! Welcome to Tunisia! I'm Yasmine, and I'm so excited to help you plan your perfect trip. To get started, could you tell me a little bit about what kind of travel experience you're looking for? Are you dreaming of adventure, relaxing on a beautiful beach, diving into history and culture, exploring nature, or maybe a mix of everything?
